thread.section_title: Easy Comforts Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Easy Comforts | www.easycomforts.com | 8 of 216
thread.title: ROSLYN S CARREN
thread.title_full: Easy Comforts reviewed by ROSLYN S CARREN

author: ROSLYN S CARREN
title: ROSLYN S CARREN
text:
Your products designed to make using my hands less painful, are in most cases, very helpful. However, I think more consideration should be used in making packaging easier to open. I also find it very painful and difficult to open the battery compartments on most of your electronic products.
I will keep trying, until you get it right.
